import React, { useState } from "react"; import classNames from "../utils/class-names"; import useInterval from "../utils/useInterval"; function PomodoroSettings ({pomodoro, focusTime, playPause, isTimerRunning}) { let focusMinutes = Math.floor(pomodoro.focus / 60); let focusSeconds = pomodoro.focus - focusSeconds * 60; let breakMinutes = Math.floor(pomodoro.break / 60); let breakSeconds = pomodoro.break - breakSeconds * 60; function formatTime(string,pad,length) { return (new Array(length+1).join(pad)+string).slice(-length); } const focusTimeString = formatTime(focusMinutes,'0',2)+':'+formatTime(focusSeconds,'0',2); const breakTimeString = formatTime(breakMinutes,'0',2)+':'+formatTime(breakSeconds,'0',2); return (
{/* TODO: Update this text to display the current focus session duration */} Focus Duration: {focusTimeString}
{/* TODO: Implement decreasing focus duration and disable during a focus or break session */} {/* TODO: Implement increasing focus duration and disable during a focus or break session */}
{/* TODO: Update this text to display the current break session duration */} Break Duration: {breakTimeString}
{/* TODO: Implement decreasing break duration and disable during a focus or break session*/} {/* TODO: Implement increasing break duration and disable during a focus or break session*/}
{/* TODO: Implement stopping the current focus or break session and disable when there is no active session */}
); } export default PomodoroSettings;
